participant_1.background:
My favorite beer is coors.
I love to play basketball.
My wife is a hairdresser.
I work in car sales.

participant_2.background:
I am a vegan.
I love the beach.
I love country music.
I like to read.

content.text: Hi, I'm a car salesman and my favorite beer is Coors. What's your favorite beer?
I'm not much of a drinker, but I love country music. What's your favorite country song?
I love "The Dance" by Garth Brooks. What's your favorite book?
I love to read historical fiction. I just finished "The Book Thief" by Markus Zusak.
I've heard good things about that book. What's your favorite thing to do at the beach?
I love to swim and sunbathe. What's your favorite thing to do in the car?
I love to listen to music and talk on the phone. What's your favorite thing about being a vegan?
I feel healthier and I have more energy. I also love animals and I don't want to eat them.
That's a great reason. I think I could go vegan if I had the willpower.
It's not as hard as it seems. There are so many great vegan recipes out there.
I'll have to try some. I'm always looking for new ways to cook.
I'm sure you'll find some you like. It's a lot of fun to experiment with new flavors and ingredients.
I'm excited to try it out.
I'm sure you'll be glad you did.
